abstract: New York Giants prepare to face Seattle Seahawks, trying to avoid the pitfall of overlooking an unheralded opponent.
snippet: Despite a home game on Sunday against a team, Seattle, with a 1-3 record, the Giants do not want to be caught napping.
lead_paragraph: Despite a home game on Sunday against a team, Seattle, with a 1-3 record, the Giants do not want to be caught napping.

headline.main: Giants See Need for High Intensity Against Seahawks
headline.print_headline: Giants See Need for High Intensity Against Seahawks
headline.seo: Giants Seed Need for Intensity Against Seahawks
